bruce

e Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team

 [EVP-ITC] Re: ADDING TO THE IMPORTANT MESSAGE




One thing we have that t=
hey do not--Purple Princess! That other stuff not matter.  Frank-s


To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ursulabielski@...: Wed, 28 Nov 200=
7 16:44:58 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: ADDING TO THE IMPORTANT MESSAGE
=



Bruce,
I just wanted to drop a line and say Amen!   Granted, the electro=
nic element is the 'e' in EVP (and the 'i' in ITC), but the most accomplish=
ed researchers (including Maggy and Jules, Konstantin and Friedrich, and ye=
s, Mark Macy, insist that if you have the harmony, love, and RESONANCE amon=
g researchers, all the electronic problems can be overcome.  
Is anyone inv=
olved in the AA-EVP 'Big Circle' group?  I see that they attempt contact al=
l at once from their own homes around the country, I think on Thursday even=
ings at a set time.
Is anyone interested in this?  From what I see, and fro=
m my own new interest, it seems most of us try contacts as much as possible=
 throughout the day.  Anyone want to try a set time?
UrsulaLance Oliver <or=
bhunterx@...> wrote:


Hello Bruce,Forgive me for bluntness, but typi=
ng in all capital letters is considered to be shouting by some of us. It's =
also hard to follow. Absolutely no offense intended... I just thought you s=
hould know.Thanks,Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, 'bhali333' <paranorm=
alinvestigating@...> wrote:>> HI GUY'S JUST A SHORT EXPLANATION OF WHAT I H=
AVE BEEN ABLE TO GATHER.> > > > ANYONE THAT IS A SERIOUS EVP RESEARCHER HAS=
 PROBABLY READ THE ARTICLES > AND OR BOOKS PERTAINING TO THE EALY TIME STRE=
AM EXPERIMENTS AND WHAT > WAS CALLED THE CIRCLE OF LIGHT. IT INVOLVED SUCH =
RESEARCHERS AS MAGGY > HERSHBACH AND HER HUSBAND THAT WHERE THE RECIPIENTS =
OF LONG LENGTHY > MESSAGES IN ALL DIFFERENT FORMATS FROM THE SPIRIT WORLD T=
HEY IN TURN > WORKED WITH SUCH EVP PIONEERS AS HANS MUELLER, KONSTANTINE > =
RAUDIVA,GEORGE MEEK AND MARK MACY TO NAME A FEW. THESE EARLY PIONEERS > THR=
OUGH THE HERSHBACHS IN LUXEMBORG RECIEVED DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS ON > HOW TO=
 FURTHER COMMUNICATION THAT NOT ONLY LED TO OUR CURRENT EVP > GATHERING TEC=
HNIQUES BUT ALSO THE MOTHER OF ALL BOXES THE SPIRICOM.> THESE RESEARCHERS W=
ERE TOLD THE MOST IMPORTANT INGREDIANT IN THE > STRENGTH AND FURTHERENCE OF=
 SPIRIT COMMUNICATION WAS HARMONY AND PEACE > AND GOOD INTENTIONS WITHIN TH=
IS CIRCLE THEY HAD BEEN LED TO FORM.> > BUT SADLY AS HUMAN BEINGS USUALLY D=
O JELOUSY AND EGO BECAME A POISON TO > THE CIRCLE AND SOME INDIVIDUALS THAT=
 WHERE ENVIOUS OF OTHERS SUPERIOR > SUCESSES BROUGHT BAD VIBRATIONSS TO THE=
 GROUP AND THE CIRCLE WAS BROKEN.> > IMMEDIATLY FOLLOWING THE ADVANCED COMM=
UNICATION THAT HAD BEEN ENJOYED > FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS SLOWLY DWINDLED AWA=
Y.> > NOW I BELIEVE WE ARE BEING GIVEN A SECOND CHANCE TO ACCOMPLISH THIS >=
 UNPRESIDENTED TASK AND BRIDGE THE GAP OF COMMUNICATION FULLY.> AS OF LATE =
THERE HAS BEEN A FLOOD OF NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT SEEMS TO BE > WORKING AS HOPE=
D WE ARE IN OUR FETAL STAGES BUT I HAVE BEEN TOLD WE > WILL BE BROUGHT ALON=
G SLOWELY AND CAREFULLY.> > SO MY THOUGHTS ARE LETS KEEP THE GOOD VIBES AND=
 HARMONY GOING AND BLOCK > AS MUCH OF THE NEGATIVITY AS WE CAN AND ALL WORK=
 TOGETHER TWORD THIS > COMMON GOAL. LETS NOT LET THE SINS OF OUR FATHER SO =
TO SPEAK AFFECT > WHAT WE CAN ACCOMPLISH.> > BRUCE HALLIDAY>

Your smile co=
unts. The more smiles you share, the more we donate. Join in!

<DIV>Hello Bruce,<BR><BR>Forgiv=
e me for bluntness, but typing in all capital letters is <BR>considered to =
be shouting by some of us. It's also hard to follow. <BR><BR>Absolutely no =

ps<WBR>.com</A>, 'bhali333' <BR><paranormalinvestig<WBR>ating@...<WBR>&g=
t; wrote:<BR>><BR>> HI GUY'S JUST A SHORT EXPLANATION OF WHAT I HAVE =
BEEN ABLE TO <BR>GATHER.<BR>> <BR>> <BR>> <BR>> ANYONE THAT IS =
A SERIOUS EVP RESEARCHER HAS PROBABLY READ THE <BR>ARTICLES <BR>> AND OR=
 BOOKS PERTAINING TO THE EALY TIME STREAM EXPERIMENTS AND <BR>WHAT <BR>>=
 WAS CALLED THE CIRCLE OF LIGHT. IT INVOLVED SUCH RESEARCHERS AS <BR>MAGGY =
<BR>> HERSHBACH AND HER HUSBAND THAT WHERE THE RECIPIENTS OF LONG LENGTH=
Y <BR>> MESSAGES IN ALL DIFFERENT FORMATS FROM THE SPIRIT WORLD THEY IN =
<BR>TURN <BR>> WORKED WITH SUCH EVP PIONEERS AS HANS MUELLER, KONSTANTIN=
E <BR>> RAUDIVA,GEORGE MEEK AND MARK MACY TO NAME A FEW. THESE EARLY <BR=
>PIONEERS <BR>> THROUGH THE HERSHBACHS IN LUXEMBORG RECIEVED DETAILED IN=
STRUCTIONS <BR>ON <BR>> HOW TO FURTHER COMMUNICATION THAT NOT ONLY LED T=
O OUR CURRENT EVP <BR>> GATHERING TECHNIQUES BUT ALSO THE MOTHER OF ALL =
BOXES THE SPIRICOM.<BR>> THESE RESEARCHERS WERE TOLD THE MOST IMPORTANT =
INGREDIANT IN THE <BR>> STRENGTH AND FURTHERENCE OF SPIRIT COMMUNICATION=
 WAS HARMONY AND <BR>PEACE <BR>> AND GOOD INTENTIONS WITHIN THIS CIRCLE =
THEY HAD BEEN LED TO FORM.<BR>> <BR>> BUT SADLY AS HUMAN BEINGS USUAL=
LY DO JELOUSY AND EGO BECAME A <BR>POISON TO <BR>> THE CIRCLE AND SOME I=
NDIVIDUALS THAT WHERE ENVIOUS OF OTHERS <BR>SUPERIOR <BR>> SUCESSES BROU=
GHT BAD VIBRATIONSS TO THE GROUP AND THE CIRCLE WAS <BR>BROKEN.<BR>> <BR=
>> IMMEDIATLY FOLLOWING THE ADVANCED COMMUNICATION THAT HAD BEEN <BR>ENJ=
OYED <BR>> FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS SLOWLY DWINDLED AWAY.<BR>> <BR>> =
NOW I BELIEVE WE ARE BEING GIVEN A SECOND CHANCE TO ACCOMPLISH THIS <BR>&gt=
; UNPRESIDENTED TASK AND BRIDGE THE GAP OF COMMUNICATION FULLY.<BR>> AS =
OF LATE THERE HAS BEEN A FLOOD OF NEW TECHNOLOGY THAT SEEMS TO <BR>BE <BR>&=
gt; WORKING AS HOPED WE ARE IN OUR FETAL STAGES BUT I HAVE BEEN TOLD WE <BR=
>> WILL BE BROUGHT ALONG SLOWELY AND CAREFULLY.<BR>> <BR>> SO MY T=
HOUGHTS ARE LETS KEEP THE GOOD VIBES AND HARMONY GOING AND <BR>BLOCK <BR>&g=
t; AS MUCH OF THE NEGATIVITY AS WE CAN AND ALL WORK TOGETHER TWORD <BR>THIS=
 <BR>> COMMON GOAL. LETS NOT LET THE SINS OF OUR FATHER SO TO SPEAK AFFE=
CT <BR>> WHAT WE CAN ACCOMPLISH.<BR>> <BR>> BRUCE HALLIDAY<BR>>=
<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE><BR><BR><BR></DIV><SPAN style=3D"COLOR: wh=
ite"></SPAN></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE><BR>
